item.description:
Three days of fun and planes... I put a Friday morning down as it looked like the best of the three days.... Going another day? Send an email to the group and get company...

Exhibit Halls, Social Events and Seminars... Airportfest:

After making its debut in 2009 at the AOPA Aviation Summit in Tampa, Airportfest is one of the “must see” features of Summit. Airportfest combines a one-of-a-kind static aircraft display with so much more!

Complimentary transportation will whisk you from the Connecticut Convention Center over to Hartford-Brainard Airport (the home of Airportfest), each day of Summit.

Airportfest is open all three days of Summit.

Make the trip out to Hartford-Brainard Airport and see all that Airportfest has to offer:

  • Nearly 100 aircraft on display
  • Airportfest Main Stage
  • Food concessions
  • AOPA Learn to Fly Center
  • Special Guest speakers
  • Fun flying activities for adults and kids …and much more!
Seminars

Thousands of pilots attend AOPA Aviation Summit each year with a specific goal in mind: Become a better, safer pilot. The educational forums at Summit offer multiple opportunities for pilots to learn from the experts on safety tips, stick-and-rudder techniques, aircraft ownership, and more. Many of the Air Safety Institutes popular Safety Seminars also are showcased during the event.

Check back for a detailed list of forum descriptions, presenters, times, and locations.

Seminar and Exhibit Hall Advanced Registration Rates: AOPA Members $55, Non-Members $70 (per day)

 

http://www.aopa.org/summit/
item.why: AOPA Summit in our backyard in September.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Visit the AOPA Summit in Hartford
